name: Pricilla
info: A Sinner adept at Physical Output. Deals 5% more Damage, and another 5% more for enemies with broken Cores.
criminalRecord:
One half of the phantom robber duo [[[Tetra | Fox ]]] and Rabbit, the subject goes by the code name //Rabbit//. Serial theft suspect whose crimes involved an inestimable sum. It's unclear where the money has gone. The serial thefts have inspired multiple copycat crimes, seriously undermining social stability.

Later snuck into an important organization of the EDGE with a partner, jeopardizing the intelligence security of DisCity. The subject must be strictly supervised.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Able to distort space with her power, enlarging or shrinking a target area or space. The suitcase created with her power can store a large volume of weapons and resources. It can even be used as a hiding spot or an emergency exit.

+++* Awakening Signs
According to the subject's account, the subject was cornered following a failed theft attempt and the fear induced her awakening. The subject was able to distort the space and escape the life-threatening plight in the end.

+++* Corruption State
With scarce Hypercube resources, Zart Village lacks protection. But the nature of the subject's body is unique and it has developed a certain resistance to contamination. Both the corruption level and mutation speed are low and the mental state is stable.
ecbFlavourText:
"Turns out that damn fox hid so many things from me..."
"Damn it! Had I been told earlier, things wouldn't have been so damn hard!"
arrestRec1: Snuck into the MBCC with the accomplice and intended to steal property information from the Chief's office using their special power. Security discovered the subject's escape trail in time and a close investigation resulted in the subject's detainment.
servingTerm1: Unwilling to submit to rules or teaching, the subject has repeatedly managed to escape from the Bureau despite having announced the escapes beforehand. She calls it an //escape game//. Out of the 175 //escape games// she's played with the Chief, Pricilla has had 174 losses and 1 tie.
servingTerm2: Passionate about flamboyant and bizarre disguises and possesses masterful transformative makeup skills. Many times, she's been surrounded by curious onlooking Sinners for her dramatic and strange guises. This has brought a strong party vibe to the Bureau and seriously disturbs the strict execution of routine management work
servingTerm3: Is friendly with many Sinners and often visits other Sinners in their detention rooms outside the permitted hours. It's impossible to police her visiting means. The staff have been reassuring themselves that "it's good for fostering the friendship among Sinners" and tolerating her roaming from one room to another.
servingTerm4: Once, the subject got drunk and volunteered to perform magic tricks. Toward the end of the performance, she slipped into the suitcase she always brought with her and vanished. The next morning, a still unconscious Pricilla was found next to the Chief's bed. She claimed she had no idea why she was sleeping in the Chief's bedroom.
emotionCheck1:
[Pricilla is cleaning her props.]

**Pricilla:** I haven't performed for so long. Some of the props are covered in dust.

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Are you off to be a magician thief again?
 * **Pricilla:** I'm the righteous Robber Rabbit! Just like Robinhood, you know?

supervision1:
++* âš  Leaning Tower of Pizza

//A wall made of pizzas is moving.//

**System Notifications:** A human wall has formed near the cafeteria. On closer inspection, it turns out that people are watching Pricilla delivering pizza orders for the Logistics Department. The boxes are stacked higher than her.

* **Prompt:** Share the load
supervision2:
++* âš  Magic Show

//Pricilla's impromptu magic shows are always packed.//

**System Notifications:** When Pricilla gets excited, she performs magic tricks using the personal items of those around her. The acts are diverse, ranging from transforming live people to guessing playing cards, and sometimes even doing instant costume changes.

* **Prompt:** Give her a round of applause
supervision3:
++* âš  Pipes Are Steel Too

//The ceiling pipes in the Recreation Area have burst.//

**System Notifications:** A pipe in the Recreation Area's ceiling has burst and it's difficult to repair. Unexpectedly, Pricilla climbs up the pipe and quickly plugs the leak.

* **Prompt:** Did you manage this with your pole dancing skills?
supervision4:
++* âš âš  Busy Bee

//During activity time, Pricilla is as busy as a bee.//

**System Notifications:** During a rare time off, Sinners are mostly relaxing. Only Pricilla, running around with her suitcase, seems out of place.

**Pricilla:** Mm, these snacks need to be delivered here. And this pile of experimental materials. Oh, I almost forgot the guy also asked me to get some canvases.

**Pricilla:** It's almost time, I need to hurry over to wash the bottles. After that, I think I need to go fix the greenhouse's water faucet...

* **Prompt:** Why are you so busy?

**System Notifications:** Pricilla walks straight towards you as if she didn't hear what you said. You aren't able to react in time and you crash into each other, causing her suitcase to fall on the ground.

**Pricilla:** Ouch! Who? Why can't you leave me alone... Oh, it's you, Chief.

* **Prompt:** Pick up the suitcase

**Chief:** Sorry, I couldn't dodge in time.

**Chief:** Speaking of, why are you so busy? Do you have that much work to do?

**Pricilla:** Ah, it's an old habit. I feel uneasy if I just sit around doing nothing.

**Pricilla:** And I also need to make money. Who knows, the money I earn might come in handy in the future.

**Chief:** That's true. But who gave you all this work?

**Pricilla:** Hehe, these are all trade secrets. Anyway, thanks, Chief! I'll get back to it. Bye!
supervision5:
++* âš âš  Small Memorial

//Pricilla has a cherished old photograph.//

**System Notifications:** The usually busy Pricilla is nowhere to be found today. Curious, you check the surveillance cameras and find her in the photo studio.
Pricilla is holding a tiny old, small photo, staring at it in a daze.

* **Prompt:** Go check the situation

**Chief:** Is this... a family photo?

**Pricilla:** ...Oh, it's you, Chief. Yes, I found this when I went back home to tidy up.

**Chief:** It looks well-kept.

**System Notifications:** Pricilla doesn't answer you immediately. She stares at the photo for a while longer and murmurs to herself.

**Pricilla:** Why is it... always like this? Only when you've lost something, do you know to cherish. Only when you are wrong, do you regret.

**Pricilla:** So what's the point of regret? Some things, once you lose it, will never come back...

* **Prompt:** Comfort her

**Chief:** We can't change the past, but we can cherish what we still have.

**System Notifications:** You use the high-end copier in the photo studio to scan and print a new copy of the photo. Then you take out a small pendant and embed the photo in it.

**Chief:** I believe that someone as kind and just as you will cherish once-lost things.

**System Notifications:** Pricilla takes the pendant and turns away. At the sight of her slightly trembling body, you say nothing more and leave the studio.

**Pricilla:** Thank you, Chief...
supervision6:
++* âš âš âš  Expert at Work

//You need professional help to retrieve your communication device.//

**System Notifications:** [[[Hella]]] has taken your communication device as a prank again and is now sleeping soundly on your sofa while holding onto it. If you want to have a good night's sleep tonight, you cannot wake her up by reaching for the device. What should you do?

* **Prompt:** Shh! Pricilla, help me out!

**Pricilla:** What... is... it...?

**Chief:** Can you help me get my communication device? Yes, the one in Hella's hand.

**Pricilla:** Can't you take the communication device by yourself? Do you need Robber Rabbit to do it?

**Chief:** I don't want to wake her up. Otherwise, she'll take the opportunity to extort me, and I won't be able to sleep tonight.

**Pricilla:** Ah, that sounds fun, let me give it a try. But it seems like I only have one chance. Shouldn't you come up with a strategy first?

* **Prompt:** Pull it out
 * **Chief:** Let's try to just pull it out. She seems to be sleeping soundly, so it should be fine.
 * **Pricilla:** I guess I can do that, but Chief, she seems to have just fallen asleep, are you sure about this?
 * **Chief:** I don't care anymore. I also want a good night's sleep.
 * **System Notifications:** Pricilla silently approaches Hella and in a blink of an eye, she pulls out the device.
 * **System Notifications:** Surprisingly, Hella is just pretending to sleep. She immediately grabs Pricilla's wrist.
 * **Hella:** Hehe, trying to see through Master Hella feigning death... I mean, feigning sleep, you stinky Chief, you are still 800 years too early for that~
 * **Chief:** Seems like I won't have a good night's sleep tonight...

* **Prompt:** Replace it with a remote
 * **Chief:** Let's trick her with that remote control.
 * **Pricilla:** Good idea, Chief! Seems you have the potential to do this line of work.
 * **Chief:** I'm a law-abiding citizen.
 * **Pricilla:** I know, I know. Here I go!
 * **System Notifications:** Pricilla silently approaches Hella and in a blink of an eye, she pulls out the device and replaces it with the remote control.
 * **System Notifications:** After getting the communication device, Pricilla appears in front of you with a "whoosh" sound and hands it to you.
 * **Pricilla:** It's still warm!
 * **Chief:** Thank you, Pricilla.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Oh my! Many police officers have chased Robber Rabbit, but you're the only one who caught me!

[Raise to Phase 1]
The next performance will be even more spectacular...

[Raise to Phase 3]
The lights are set, and the stage is perfect! Are you ready? A spectacular phantom burglary is about to begin!

[Level Start]
Let me give you a spoiler: I'm going to run away in a bit! Better catch up to me!

[Win Battles]
Taking back the notice! There was a great response to this mission, too!

[Lose Battles]
I'm sorry... I'm sorry... I shouldn't have done that...

[Ultimate Skill]
Rob the rich and give to the poor!

[Die in Battles]
Can you forgive me now...

[Greeting]
Good morning! Good afternoon! Good evening! Hahaha, this means I want to see you all day!

[Conversation 1]
How trusting the Bureau must be to just put their precious Chief right here before me... Aren't you afraid I'll stuff you in a suitcase and run away?

[Conversation 2]
When night falls, the whole of DisCity becomes my stage!

[Conversation 3]
I am the righteous Robber Rabbit, robbing the rich to help the poor! I am not a thief! Don't compare me to that kleptomaniac fox! Teaming up with her was just a coincidence.

[Special Conversation 1]
Well, I'm not doing this entirely out of righteousness... it's more like belated atonement.

[Special Conversation 2]
Chief, you should really find some time to control that fox! It sucks for me to be her partner.

[Special Conversation 3]
I guess maybe I could just retire and retreat from my old business... After all, you'll lead us to keep pursuing justice, right Chief?

[Full Compliance]
We will part someday, too. A free phantom robber won't stay by anyone's side forever... oh, are you sad? There there, I'm not leaving now. I'll stay with you for a bit longer.

[Idle]
The quality of this metal rod is pretty good... If you're bored, how about I dance for you?

[Annoyed]
Hehe, oh Chief, if you make trouble again, I will...

[Special Attention]
A phantom robber could disappear at any time. Now you see me, now you don't...

[Dispatch]
If you let me out... will you be able to catch me again?

[Dispatch Complete]
Ugh, there's nothing valuable there anyway...

[Level Up]
I can carry the whole world in my luggage!
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Notice letter recovery... So, did you like the shower of petals I gave you?... Hehe, since you liked it, I'll be keeping your heart...

[Greeting]
Shhh... Be quiet. You don't want irrelevant people to come bother us, do you? Come. This rose is for you.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
This mask is part of the Robber Rabbit's identity. It should never be taken off lightly. But since you've seen my real face, I can't let you off the hook...

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Cinderella's not the only who fled the ball. There's also the heart-stealing Phantom Robber, who left with a full bag of loot...

[Idle] 
I'm so bored... One petal... Two petals...

[Annoyed]
Hey, stop moving around, will ya? You want to discover my flaws? Hmph... You're just like that damn fox! Anyways, my costume is perfect...

[Special Attention] 
Don't be shocked. I'm willing to get caught for a treasure I really want.

[Level Up}
Heart-stealing mission accomplished...
nightmareTalent: Gain 2 [Nightmare Keys] when the Sinner is recruited into the team.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: The Phantom Robber
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When Pricilla performs [Curtain Call], she summons 1 more clown to assist, which deals 40%/45%/50% of Pricilla's Normal Attack Damage in each hit.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"Turns out that damn fox hid so many things from me..."
"Damn it! Had I been told earlier, things wouldn't have been so damn hard!"

crimebrandSets.name: BFL with Coquelic
crimebrandSets.note: Pricilla's Ult cost is very high, for this reason you will likely want to run a full energy set on her so you can run Last Stand. Even if you run Empower, you would likely rather use it on other characters.

crimebrandSets.name: Servant + Pandora
crimebrandSets.note: Best set for Pricilla's personal damage. Deal extra Physical Damage and also generate energy through your summon (unlocked through ECB).

crimebrandSets.name: Boss Burst
crimebrandSets.note: If you are dealing a lot of damage with Pricilla during a Boss' break window and you do not need energy.

crimebrandSets.name: Budget
crimebrandSets.note: A very cheap alternative for if you have no other option available. Deal increased Normal Attack damage.

shackles.title: Bunny Time
shackles.description: [Exclusive Stage]: Attack Speed bonus increased to 120%.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Notice Letter
skills.description: Pricilla attacks with her submachine gun, dealing (56% of Attack damage) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Curtain Call
skills.description: Pricilla decides to end the performance with a spectacular gun show. She pulls out two submachine guns and unleashes a hail of bullets. For the next 14 seconds, her Normal Attack turns to a 2-hit one, each hit dealing (40% of her Attack) Physical Damage, during which she can't automatically recover Energy.

skills.name: Heart-stealing Magic
skills.description: Pricilla's Normal Attacks have a 15% chance to fire [Magic Bullets], dealing (40% of her Attack) extra Physical Damage.

skills.name: Exclusive Stage
skills.description: During the [Curtain Call], Pricilla's Attack Speed is increased by 100% but her Normal Attack damage is reduced by 45%.

compliance: Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +6, Unlock Requirements: Use non-assist Pricilla to destroy 100 enemies
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlocking Condition: Raising the level of Pricilla to Level 2
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Sticker
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Heart-stealing Rabbit Shadow
